def.name: The series administered to the client contains the same product

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: The series administered to the client contains the same product

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine brand" (where "Vaccine type" = "Rotavirus vaccines" AND "Dose number" = 1) = "Vaccine brand" (where "Vaccine type" = "Rotavirus vaccines" AND "Dose number" = 2)

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: The series administered to the client contains the same product-169

def.name: The series administered to the client is a mixed series or a series with unknown vaccine products

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: The series administered to the client is a mixed series or a series with unknown vaccine products

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine brand" (where "Vaccine type" = "Rotavirus vaccines" AND "Dose number" = 1) ≠ "Vaccine brand" (where "Vaccine type" = "Rotavirus vaccines" AND "Dose number" = 2)

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: The series administered to the client is a mixed series or a series with unknown vaccine products-169

a:s.a:s: "The series administered to the client contains the same product"

operand.name: The series administered to the client contains the same product
